a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Attendance vs. net enrolment rate in primary education, 2019
Net enrolment rate is the number of students of the official age group for primary education who are enrolled in any
level of education, expressed as a percentage of the corresponding population.
Data source: UNESCO Institute for Statistics via World Bank (2023)
